Hi there,
I have a list of seed URLs which get redirected. I'm not sure
how=
 I should understand the seeds report which Heritrix (1.8.0) writes.

The r=
eport says, for example, that Heritrix failed to crawl seed
http://kitarapa=
ja.com/ and it will keep on trying.

But searching log shows that Heritrix =
has taken plenty of files from
the address http://www.kitarapaja.com/ inclu=
ding the site's main page.

On the other hand there are many redirected see=
ds which are reported
correctly like HTTP-302-Redirect-Found http://kihaus.=
fi/ ->
http://www.kihaus.fi/etusivu2006
